channel.title: CVE Feed for Dominion Voting Systems -- ImageCast X application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dominion Voting Systems -- ImageCast X application

item.title: CVE-2022-1741|2024-09-16T21:07:37.102Z -- dominion%20voting%20systems -- imagecast%20x%20application
item.description: The tested version of Dominion Voting Systems ImageCast X has a Terminal Emulator application which could be leveraged by an attacker to gain elevated privileges on a device and/or install malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2022-1740|2024-09-16T17:09:01.249Z -- dominion%20voting%20systems -- imagecast%20x%20application
item.description: The tested version of Dominion Voting Systems ImageCast Xâ€™s on-screen application hash display feature, audit log export, and application export functionality rely on self-attestation mechanisms. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to disguise malicious applications on a device.
